meanings.definition: A device that measures the rate of something.
meanings.sent1: The ratemeters in the lab helped scientists track the speed of the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The company purchased new ratemeters to monitor the production efficiency.
meanings.sent3: During the race, the ratemeters suddenly started measuring the speed of the spectators instead of the runners.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like ratemeters, constantly assessing the movement of people around her.
meanings.sent5: The ratemeters beeped rhythmically, indicating the steady flow of data being recorded.
